rawText:
In breaking news, folks, it appears that Sean Combs, aka Puff Daddy, aka Diddy, aka "Man Who Can’t Keep His Hands to Himself," is back in the headlines. Just a day after settling a lawsuit with his ex-girlfriend, his former chief of staff is now facing three lawsuits for allegedly playing a rather dubious role in the whole sordid affair. Remember, ladies and gentlemen, if you’re going to be famous, make sure your staff knows how to keep it scandal-free. 

Hit that like button and subscribe for more delightful updates on celebrity drama that's never, ever boring. This has been PotatoHead, wasting your time as usual.
